body.p: To create a new schedule, please follow the below steps:

ol.li: On the Apttus Omni page, select the Home icon and select Admin > Admin Console.
Click Application Administration > Customer Incentive Management (CIM).

Click JobSchedules.
The Schedule page appears.
Click New Schedule.The below section appears, as shown in the image.
Enter a meaningful process name in the Process Name field.
Enter a description in the Description field.
Select the applicable process from the Process drop-down list.
Select schedule frequency as Daily, Weekly, or Monthly from the Schedule Frequency drop-down list.
Provide a Start Date, for example, today or tomorrow's date, and then select a time.
Provide an End Date and time.

Click Schedule at the top right corner.
Note
Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
After you saved the schedule, go to the Schedule main page and validate the entry.

body.p: The created schedule and related details are listed on the New Schedule page, as shown in the below image.

ol.li: Select Customer Incentive Manager > Monitor Processes.
Click the New Process.

You can view the jobs created using the new process page and the schedule page in the monitor process page when they are triggered to run.To trigger the calculation process, schedules and results must be in either open or active status.
In the configuration page, enter the Job Name and Description.

Select the Job Type as Calculation and the Program Type as Billing Program.
Search and search result fields are displayed depends upon the type of program selected.

Selected program lookup field displays the following options if you select the Billing Program.
All Programs
Search for Programs

On selecting Search for Programs, you can view the search filter with all programs. Select one or many programs.You can add program schedule status in the search field for calculation. The program schedule must be in open status for calculation.
Click Process Immediately for immediate calculation.
Click Schedule. A new window is displayed for scheduling.
Select the Schedule and click Calculate.A new window is displayed with a calculation summary.
Enter either the Account Name, or Line Item Id, or Product Name in any combination. You can view the calculation details for the selected account or program.
